alert.note: Alert for Coahoma (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coahoma County through 415 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings, or 8 miles north of Clarksdale, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Jonestown, Friars Point, Dublin, Kings, Coahoma, Lyon, Mattson, Counts, Rudyard, Hopson, Bobo, Beverly, Clover Hill, Roseacres, Lurand, Matagorda and Claremont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
